answers.answer: Hi,Pins and needles sensation is a type of paraesthesia or abnormal nerve sensation. There can be many causes for this type of sensation like a nerve entrapment, traumatic nerve injury, nerve compression, peripheral neuropathy, diabetes, or hypothyroidism. The exact cause can be identified by clinical exam and tests.I would suggest you to please schedule an appointment with a physician and under a complete clinical and neurological examination. You can discuss these possibilities with your doctor.

question: Hi,I am experiencing a pins and needles sensation all down my back from my head back legs and arms feet but never down the front. i also have numb lips. what could be causing this?
title: pins and needles and numb lips
